Retrofit Bookmark

1) Drag Me <-- Drag this into your Chrome bookmark bar

2) Visit lullabot.com and click on the bookmarklet. This will load in a responsive retrofit stylesheet and a bit of javascript.

2) Resize your browser to see various breakpoints
